detail_desc: Short skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and a raw-edge hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket, contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Large earrings in metal and plastic with pendants in various sizes and designs. Length approx. 11 cm.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Quilted sections at the sides and cuffs, and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Loafers with tassels and a moccasin seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake fly.
Fitted top in soft jersey with short sleeves.
Belt in grained imitation leather that can be worn both at the waist and hips. Two buckles, loops and tips in embossed metal. Width 2.5 cm.

prod_name: FUNC. SB Texas water res TP
detail_desc: Jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Fleece-lined stand-up collar, a detachable hood and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Long wrap dress in an airy, patterned jacquard weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck and frill-trimmed shoulder straps. Seam with narrow ties at the waist and a flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined skirt.

Wide-legged shorts in woven fabric with a high, pleated paper bag waist and detachable belt with a covered buckle. Fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fasteners, pockets in the side seams and fake back pockets.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with frills and buttons down the front.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Leather sandals with crossover straps at the front, padded leather insoles and rubber soles.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and zipped, diagonal side pockets.

Set with a long-sleeved jumper and pair of trousers in a soft jacquard knit. Jumper with a roll edge neckline, decorative bow at the top, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back, wide flounce at the top and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fleece gloves with ribbing at the cuffs. Unlined.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Wide shoulder straps, a low cut at the back and a wide, ribbed hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Short jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with an open back and ties at the back of the neck. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Vest top in printed jersey with an asymmetric, overlocked hem.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short jersey dress with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Scarf in soft, fine knit with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides. Size 65x180 cm.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and high cut at the back.
Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Shorts in soft, patterned cotton poplin with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and scalloped hems with overlocked edges.

Jacket in a woven cotton blend with a stand-up collar with a decorative zip, and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Flap chest and patch pockets with a button, a concealed drawstring at the waist and a button at the cuffs. Lined.

Long outdoor jacket in nylon with a hood with an elastic drawstring, zip down the front and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Cotton jersey vest top with a print motif on the front.
Headbands in a soft knit, one decorated with pearly plastic beads.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Metal hoop earrings with a small plastic bead. Length 3.8 cm.

Shirt in airy end-on-end cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Alice band covered in braided satin with metal flowers decorated with plastic beads and glass rhinestones.
Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a pleated weave with a double flounce at the top, short sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Satin lining.

Shirt in an airy linen and cotton blend with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Set with a long-sleeved jersey top, corduroy shorts and a pair of fine-knit tights. Top with a round neckline that has a small opening and button at the back. Shorts with a fake fly, button at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Tights with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in Tencel™ lyocell chambray with an elasticated waist, side pockets and frill trim at the hems.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for gentle lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that double at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Imitation leather sandals with narrow straps that have a metal decoration at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Dungarees in soft, stretch denim. Relaxed fit with adjustable straps, a heart-shaped chest pocket, front and back pockets, buttons at the sides and tapered legs.
Wide top in soft pile with a drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a round neckline, opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Top in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline and long sleeves.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Knee-length dress in a crinkled weave with narrow shoulder straps and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top and slits in the sides.

Calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and short sleeves. Seam at the waist with narrow, concealed elastication and a gently flared skirt with a wrapover front. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in marled cotton jersey with a collar, no buttons and slits in the sides.

Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Comes with a shoulder bag in soft cotton jersey with appliqués on the front, a hook and loop fastening at the top and a glittery shoulder strap.
Ankle-length yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections on the legs. Waistband with a concealed drawstring and a concealed key pocket.
Padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, zipped front pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Fitted skirt in jersey with a slight sheen, an elasticated waist and slit at the back. Unlined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a double-layered look. Raw edge at the top, a double-layered neckline and longer trims at the sleeves and hem with raw, roll edges.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
High-waisted, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details and a zip fly with a button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Knee-length skirt in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist and a slit at the back.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with embroidery, long, flared sleeves and a V-neck at the back with a horizontal tie at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and slim legs with creases.
Garter-stitched cotton tube scarf with ribbed edges. Width 24 cm, circumference 44 cm.
Fully lined halterneck swimsuit with cut-out sections front and back, a V-neck and narrow ties at the neck. Decorative knot detail at the top and ties at the back.
Double-breasted coat in soft fabric with wide shawl lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. One inner pocket, a tab at the back and an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with a low-cut back, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 1.5 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.2 cm.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
